import React from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; import NoteContext from '../Context/Notes/NoteContext'; const NotesItem = (props) => { const { deleteNote, editNote } = useContext(NoteContext) const { note, id } = props; console.log(id) const [enote, setEnote] = useState({ eid: '', etitle: '', edescription: '', etag: '' }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { console.log(note._id) // e.preventDefault(); console.log(note.title) note.title = enote.etitle; note.description = enote.edescription; note.tag = enote.etag; console.log(enote.etitle) editNote(note._id, enote.etitle, enote.edescription, enote.etag); } const handleChange = (e) => { console.log(e); setEnote({ ...enote, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (
{note.title}
{ console.log(note._id); return deleteNote(note._id) }}> { console.log(note._id) }}> {/* */}

{note.description}

Edit Note
) } export default NotesItem
